movies.title: Mary Queen of Scots
movies.plot: Mary Stuart's (Saoirse Ronan's) attempt to overthrow her cousin Elizabeth I (Margot Robbie), Queen of England, finds her condemned to years of imprisonment before facing execution.
movies.awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 6 wins & 27 nominations.
